verses.verse: The <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart<s%> is in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> as the <S%H6388>watercourses<s%>: <S%H4325><s%> He <S%H5186>turneth<s%> it whithersoever he <S%H2654>will<s%>.
Every <S%H1870>way<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H3477>right<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes<s%>; But <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H8505>weigheth<s%> the <S%H3826>hearts<s%>.
To <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> and <S%H6666>justice<s%> Is more <S%H977>acceptable<s%> to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> than <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>.
A <S%H7312>high<s%> <S%H5869>look<s%>, and a <S%H7342>proud<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>, Even the <S%H5215>lamp<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, is <S%H2403>sin<s%>.
The <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> of the <S%H2742>diligent<s%> tend only to <S%H4195>plenteousness<s%>; But every one that is <S%H213>hasty<s%> hasteth only to <S%H4270>want<s%>.
The <S%H6467>getting<s%> of <S%H214>treasures<s%> by a <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> Is a <S%H1892>vapor<s%> driven to and fro <S%H5086>by<s%> them that <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H4194>death<s%>.
The <S%H7701>violence<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H1641>sweep<s%> them <S%H3985>away<s%>, Because they refuse to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%>.
The <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H376>him<s%> that is <S%H2019>laden<s%> with <S%H2054>guilt<s%> is exceeding <S%H2134>crooked<s%>; But as for the pure, his <S%H6467>work<s%> is <S%H3477>right<s%>.

It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H6438>corner<s%> of the <S%H1406>housetop<s%>, Than with a <S%H4079>contentious<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> in a <S%H2267>wide<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>.
The <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H183>desireth<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>: His <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> findeth no <S%H2603>favor<s%> in his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

When the <S%H3887>scoffer<s%> is <S%H6064>punished<s%>, the <S%H6612>simple<s%> is made <S%H2449>wise<s%>; And when the <S%H2450>wise<s%> is <S%H7919>instructed<s%>, he <S%H3947>receiveth<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>.
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> man <S%H7919>considereth<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, How the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are <S%H5557>overthrown<s%> to their <S%H7451>ruin<s%>.
Whoso <S%H331>stoppeth<s%> his <S%H241>ears<s%> at the <S%H2201>cry<s%> of the <S%H1800>poor<s%>, He also shall <S%H7121>cry<s%>, but shall not be <S%H6030>heard<s%>.
A <S%H4976>gift<s%> in <S%H5643>secret<s%> <S%H3711>pacifieth<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%>; And a <S%H7810>present<s%> in the <S%H2436>bosom<s%>, <S%H5794>strong<s%> <S%H2534>wrath<s%>.
It is <S%H8057>joy<s%> to the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%>; But it is a <S%H4288>destruction<s%> to the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%>.
The <S%H120>man<s%> that <S%H8582>wandereth<s%> out of the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H7919>understanding<s%> Shall <S%H5117>rest<s%> in the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the <S%H7496>dead<s%>.
He that <S%H157>loveth<s%> <S%H8057>pleasure<s%> shall be a <S%H4270>poor<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>: He that <S%H157>loveth<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> and <S%H8081>oil<s%> shall not be <S%H6238>rich<s%>.
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is a <S%H3724>ransom<s%> for the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>; And the <S%H898>treacherous<s%> cometh in the stead of the <S%H3477>upright<s%>.
It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in a <S%H776>desert<s%> <S%H4079>land<s%>, Than with a contentious and <S%H3708>fretful<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%>.

There is <S%H2530>precious<s%> <S%H214>treasure<s%> and <S%H8081>oil<s%> in the <S%H5116>dwelling<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%>; But a <S%H3684>foolish<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> swalloweth it <S%H1104>up<s%>.
He that <S%H7291>followeth<s%> after <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> and <S%H2617>kindness<s%> <S%H4672>Findeth<s%> <S%H2416>life<s%>, <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, and <S%H3519>honor<s%>.
A <S%H2450>wise<s%> man <S%H5927>scaleth<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty<s%>, And bringeth <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H5797>strength<s%> of the confidence <S%H4009>thereof<s%>.
Whoso <S%H8104>keepeth<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> and his <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H8104>Keepeth<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H6869>troubles<s%>.
The <S%H2086>proud<s%> and <S%H2086>haughty<s%> <S%H3887>man<s%>, scoffer is his <S%H8034>name<s%>; He <S%H6213>worketh<s%> in the <S%H5678>arrogance<s%> of <S%H2087>pride<s%>.
The <S%H8378>desire<s%> of the <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> <S%H4191>killeth<s%> <S%H3027>him<s%>; For his hands <S%H3985>refuse<s%> to <S%H6213>labor<s%>.
There is that <S%H183>coveteth<s%> <S%H8378>greedily<s%> all the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6662>long<s%>; But the righteous <S%H5414>giveth<s%> and withholdeth <S%H2820>not<s%>.
The <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%>: How much <S%H935>more<s%>, when he bringeth it with a wicked <S%H2154>mind<s%>!
A <S%H3577>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> shall <S%H6>perish<s%>; But the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H8085>heareth<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> so as to <S%H5331>endure<s%>.
A <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5810>hardeneth<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%>; But as for the <S%H3477>upright<s%>, he <S%H995>establisheth<s%> his <S%H1870>ways<s%>.
There is no <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> nor <S%H8394>understanding<s%> Nor <S%H6098>counsel<s%> against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
The <S%H5483>horse<s%> is <S%H3559>prepared<s%> against the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4421>battle<s%>; But <S%H8668>victory<s%> is of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
